item.title: Walmart is slashing prices on Super Bowl party essentials — here are 13 deals I'd buy on big-screen TVs, soundbars, air fryers, and more
item.description: Walmart is slashing prices on everything you need to host a Super Bowl party, including deals on big-screen TVs, soundbars, air fryers, and more.

item.title: I don’t hate the robot barista like I thought I would
item.description: In Seattle, the only thing we love more than coffee is our coffee shops. On a six-block walk I pass at least a half dozen, each with their own vibe: one focused on chai, another inside a yoga studio, a Starbucks that's surprisingly busy for late afternoon downtown. I passed them all up to get […]

item.description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.

item.title: Apple just made some major changes to how you buy a Mac online – here's what you need to know
item.description: Buying a Mac or MacBook through the Apple Store is now much more like buying an iPhone or iPad.

item.title: Zendure solde sa station solaire SolarFlow 2400 AC à -33 % pour booster votre autoconsommation très facilement
item.description: La Zendure SolarFlow 2400 AC est une station pour les domiciles équipés de panneaux solaires qui stocke l'énergie pour la réutiliser plus tard. Une unité seule passe de 1798 euros à 1199 euros sur le site officiel.

item.title: Could 'thermodynamic computing' unlock the true possibilities of AI? These studies think so, get ready for better image generation and much more
item.description: Thermodynamic computing uses randomness and energy flows to reconstruct images, showing a possible path for low energy AI tools.

item.title: Elle coûte 2 fois moins cher qu’une Tesla Model 3 et se recharge 2 fois plus vite : on a testé la Changan Nevo A06E
item.description: En Chine, nous avons testé la nouvelle voiture électrique de Changan, la Nevo A06E. Elle coûte deux fois moins cher qu'une Tesla Model 3, tout en se rechargeant deux fois plus vite, et en proposant des options supplémentaires. L'un des meilleurs rapport qualité / prix du moment sans aucun doute.

item.title: Building a Watch Collection on a Budget? Here’s Where to Start (2026)
item.description: Yes, it is possible to scale horological heights without breaking the bank. It’s time to seek out the latest bargains.

item.title: Antigravity’s 360-degree A1 drone is 15 percent off
item.description: Antigravity’s ambitious A1 360-degree drone is 15 percent off through February 9th. The first-ever discount on this model is available across all bundles, with the most affordable option dropping from $1,599 to $1,359 at Amazon and Best Buy. Pricier bundles are also discounted and include accessories such as a carrying case, additional replaceable drone wings, […]...

item.title: What is the release date for Tell Me Lies season 3 episode 6 on Hulu and Disney+?
item.description: Does anyone have any shred of morality left in this show? Probably not, and I doubt Tell Me Lies season 3 episode 6 will be any different – here's when it drops on Hulu.

item.title: AI is breaking the prevention first mindset: Why rapid recovery now matters more than ever
item.description: AI-driven attacks are outrunning prevention, making rapid recovery essential.

item.title: Tottenham vs Man City Live Streams: How to watch Premier League 2025-26 from anywhere
item.description: All the ways to watch Tottenham vs Man City live streams online and from anywhere, with Spurs looking to do the league double over Pep Guardiola's men.
